Name: du xing cai
ting li zi
Biological: Lepidium sativum Ledeb.（水芹, 獨行菜）
Lepidium apetalum Willd.（獨行菜，北葶藶子）
Descurainia sophia (L.) Webb ex Prantl（南葶藶子，播娘蒿）
Other name: tian ting li zi 甜葶藶子

Dosage:
To take orally 3–9 g (wrap for making decoction) or make into pills or powder form.
For external use: appropriate amount. Wash with decoction or make into paste and apply.
For edema, use the raw herb. For asthmatic cough with abundant phlegm, use the stir fried herb. For asthmatic cough due to lung deficiency, use the honey baked herb.
3～9 g (包煎。) 或入丸、散。外用：適量，煎水洗或研末調敷。利水消腫宜生用；治痰飲喘咳宜炒用；肺虛喘咳宜蜜炙用。
Contraindications:
Side effects of large dosage can cause tightness in chest, nausea, vomiting, dizziness, panic, rash, pale complexion, sweating, breathing difficulty, increased heart rate, lowering of blood pressure and heart failure.
Not to use in cases of wheezing and cough due to lung qi deficiency, or in edema due to pixu (spleen deficiency).
大劑量之副作用包括：胸口悶，作嘔，嘔吐，眩暈，驚慌，紅斑，臉色蒼白，出汗，呼吸困難，心悸，血壓低，心力衰竭。忌用於：心氣虛所致之喘咳或因脾虛所致之水腫。
Notes:
The property of raw ting li zi is cold and its function is drastic and can injure the function of the lungs. After stir frying, its function is mild. Use low heat in stir frying.
註：生葶藶子性寒沉降．作用峻烈，能耗傷肺氣，炒炙後則藥性緩和。須用小火炒。
According to the Materia Medica of People Republic of China, this is the authentic ting li zi。<中華人民共和國藥典>將其列為葶藶子正品 
 Ting li zi are seeds of du xing cai (Lepidium apetalum Willd.) or seeds of bo niang hao （播娘蒿） (Descurainia sophia L.) the former is also called northern ting li zi and the latter is also called southern ting li zi.
Original Text:
du xing cai

Webb ex Prantl (南 葶藶子，播娘蒿)【1】Draba nemorosa var. hebecarpa Ledeb.Japanese:日語﹕teirekishi﹔ 
   , literally means pepper grass.Pron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕chongbangjaPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕tuk6 haang4 coi3 (獨行菜)ting4 lik6 zi2 (葶藶子)Other Names:別名﹕tian ting li zi 甜葶藶子Common Name:英文名﹕garden crest (Lepidium sativum); flixweed, herb sophia （Descurainia sophia）Distribution:產地﹕Eastern and south central China (Descurainia), northern and northeastern China (Lepidium)南葶藶子： 中國之東部，中南部水芹, 獨 行菜：中國之北部與東北部。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕acrid, bitter, cold辛，苦，寒 。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕lung, heart, liver, stomach, bladder肺， 心， 肝，胃，膀胱。Medical functions:藥理﹕ 强心作用利尿作用Actions & Indications:主治﹕in whooping cough, pleurisy, idiopathic pneumothorax, pulmonary edema, ascites, acute nephritis in children, and pyloric infarction.用於百日咳 ，肋膜炎，自發性 氣胸症，肺水腫 ，腹水，小兒急性腎炎。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕(1) Heart stimulating chemicals : stophanthidine, evomonoside, helvticoside, evbioside, erysimoside(2) glucosinolates, benzyl isothiocyanate, allyl isothiocynatge, allyl isothiocyanate, 3-butenyl isothiocyanate(3) fatty acids: linolenic acid 7.54%, linoleic acid 32.5%, oleic acid 25.1%, sinapic acid 21.4%, palmitic acid 9.64%, stearic acid 3.81%(4) seeds of du xing cai (lepidium apetalum Willd.) contain sinalbin, protein and sugarDosage:用量﹕To take orally 3 -9 g (wrap for making decoction) or make into pills or powder form.For external use: appropriate amount. Wash with decoction or make into paste and apply.For edema, use the raw herb. For asthmatic cough with abundant of phlegm, use the stir fried herb. For asthmatic cough due to lung deficient, use the honey baked herb.3 ～ 9 g (包煎。) 或入丸、散。外用：適量 ，煎水洗或研末調敷。利水消腫宜 生用；治痰飲喘咳宜炒用；肺虛喘咳宜蜜炙用。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕ Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Side effects of large dosage can cause tightness in chest, nausea, vomiting, dizziness, panic, rash, pale complexion, sweating, breathing difficulty, increased heart rate, lowering of blood pressure and heart failure.Not to use in cases of wheezing and cough due to lung qi deficient, or in edema due to pixu (spleen deficient)大剤量之副 作用包括 ：胸口悶，作嘔，嘔吐，眩晕，驚慌，紅班，臉色蒼白，出汗，呼吸困難，心悸，血壓低，心力衰竭。忌用 於：心气虚所致之喘咳或因脾虛所致之水腫 。.　　Note: the property of raw ting li zi is cold and its function is drastic and can injure the function of the lungs. After stir frying, its function is mild. Maladies Treated: retinal arterial/vein thrombosis (視網膜動/靜脈閉塞)
disease of the blood vessels of the brain （腦血管病變）
Raw san qi can stop bleeding and can transform blood stasis. It can stop bleeding without causing blood clots. It is widely used in injury medicine as in broken bones, swelling, impact injuries.
Cooked san qi can be used as tonic.
Medical Function: Stop bleeding and anticoagulation: anticoagulation of platelets, promotes dissolving of fibrinogens
Enhances the effects of adrenocortical hormone: regulate the metabolism of sugar
Arrest bleeding (active chemical: dencichine, there is more of that in raw tian qi)
Anti-biotic effect: it showed to have in vitro inhibitory effect on Norwalk virus and some dermtomycoses
Dosage:
Take as powder form: 1 to 1.5 g.
Use in decoction: 3 to 9 g.
Samples of Formulae: TMJ syndrome: apply san qi tincture on the most painful part of jaw. Once a day. 5 to 7 days is one therapy period. Result: 32 cases all show improvement in jaw movements.
Contraindications:
Allergic reaction: face and eyes becomes red and swollen. Numbness in the limbs, dizziness, heaviness in the chest, palpitation, sweating, nausea, arrhythmia.
Do not use during menses or during pregnancy.
Research: Result: 32 cases all show improvement in jaw movements after using san qi tincture for TMJ syndrome, applied on the most painful part of jaw once per day for 5 to 7 days. 【18】 [18]中药现代研究與臨床應用。陰健，郭力弓。
Notes:
菊科的田七草的根，名菊葉田七；景天科景天田七的根或全草，名景天田七，兩者有類似田七的功效而力弱，兼有解毒消炎之功。
(The root of the Asteraceae family's 'Tian Qi Herb', known as 'Juye Tianqi', and the root or whole herb of the Crassulaceae family's 'Jingtian Tianqi', both have similar functions to tian qi but are weaker, and also have detoxification and anti-inflammatory properties.)
Chemical Ingredients: essential oil: gamma-muurolene, cyperene, alpha-elemene, gamma-cadinene, delta-cadinene, alpha-gurjunene, alpha-guaiene, alpha-copaene, beta-cuabebene, caryophyllene, delta-guaiene, alpha-cedrene, 1,9,9-trimethyl-4,7-dimethano-2,3,5,6,7,8-hexahydroazulene, 1,1,5,5-tetramethyl-4-methano-2,3,4,6,7,10-hexahydronaphthalene, cuparene, beta-elemene, gamma-elemene, alpha-muurolene, beta-guaiene, 2,6-ditert-butyl-4-methyl phenol, 2,8-dimethyl-5-acetyl-bicylo[5,3,0]decadiene-1,8, methyl palmitate, ethyl palmitate, methyl heptadecadienoate, methyl octgadecadienoate, ethyl octadecadienoate, ditertbutyl phthalate, dicapryl phthalate, diisocapryl phthalate, acetic acid, heptanoic acid, octanoic acid, nonanoic acid, palmitic acid, isoallyl-benzene, phenylethanone, octadecadienoic acid, 3-ene-nonanone-2, cyclododecanone, trans-nonenal-2, tridecene, 1-methyl-4-dioximethylthino-bicycle[2,2,2]octane, tetradecane, pentadecane, hexadecane, heptadecane, octadecane, nonadecane, eicosane, heneicosane, docosane, alpha, alpha-dimethyl-benzenemethanol, 1-methoxthyl-benzene, 2,2,2-tri-ethoxyl-ethanol, 1-methyl-4-isoallyl-cyclohexane
ginsenoside Rb1, Rd, Re, Rg, Rg2, Rh1
notoginsenoside R1, R2, R3, R4, R6
References: [18]中药现代研究與臨床應用。陰健，郭力弓。

F. H. ChenPron. in Japanese：日語發音:sanshichiPron. in Korean：韓語發音:samch'ilPron. in Cantonese:粵語發音:saam1 cat1, tin4 cat1Other Names：別名:tian san qi, jin bu huan, han san qi, tian qi, shen san qi .田三七,金不換,旱三七,滇七,參三七,Common Name：英文名:notoginseng root or pseudoginseng rootDistribution:分布:Yunnan, Guangxi, Sichuan, Guizhou, Jiangxi, Guangdong云南，廣西，四川，貴州，江西，廣東。Properties (characteristics)：性味：sweet, slightly bitter, warm甘，微苦，溫。Channels (meridians) entered：歸經:liver, stomach, large intestine肝，胃，大腸。Actions & Indications：主治:Raw san qi can stop bleeding and can transform blood stasis. It can stop bleeding without causing blood clots. It is widely used in injury medicine as in broken bones, swelling, impact injuries. Cooked san qi can be used as tonic.生田七可止血亦可化瘀。能止血而不致血凝。常用于傷科如骨折斷，發腫，打傷等。熟田七常用作補藥。Medical Function:藥理:Medical Function:1. Stop bleeding and anticoagulation: anticoagulation of platelets, promotes dissolving of fibrinogens, 2. Anti-inflammation3. Relieving pain4. Calming 5. Enhances the effects of adrenocortical hormone: regulate the metabolism of sugar.6. Protects liver7 Anti cancer8. Improve capillary circulation: anti fatigue9. Anti aging10. Arrest bleeding (active chemical:dencichine, there is more of that in raw tian qi )　11. lowers serum lipids and cholesterol.12. Anti-biotic effect: it showed to have in vitro inhibitory effect on Norwalk virus and some dermtomycoses.藥理:1.  田七有止血及抗凝作用:能抑制血小板凝集，促進纖溶，並使全血粘度下降2. 抗炎3.  鎮痛4.  鎮靜5. 增強腎上腺皮質功能: 調節糖代謝﹐6. 抗腫瘤7. 保肝8.  改善心血管系統功能: 增進微循環﹐消除疲勞。9. 抗老化10.  止血：其止血活性成份為三七氨酸 (生田七含量較多）11. 降低血清中脂肪與膽固醇。12. 體外試驗，田七制剤能抑制諾瓦克病毒和有些皮膚黴菌病症菊科的田七草的根，名菊葉田七；景天科景天田七的根或全草，名景天田七，兩者有類似田七的功效而力弱，兼有解毒消炎之功。Chemical Ingredients:化學成份: Chemical Ingredients:1. essential oil: (gamma-muurolene, (cyperene),  (alpha-elemene); (gammma-cadinene), (delta-cadinene), (alpha-gurjunene), (alpha-guaiene), (alpha-copaene), beta-cuabebene), (caryophyllene), (delta-guaiene), (alpha-cedrene), (1, 9, 9-trimethyl-4, 7-dimethano-2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8-hexahydroazulene), (1, 1, 5, 5-tetramethyl-4-methano-2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 10-hexahydronaphthalene)(, (cuparene), (beta-elemene), (gamma-elemene), (alpha-muurolene), (beta-guaiene), (2, 6-ditert-butyl-4-methyl phenol), (2, 8-dimethyl-5-acetyl-bicylo[5, 3, 0] decadiene-1,8), (methyl palmitate), (ethyl palmitate), (methyl heptadecadienoate), (methyl octgadecadienoate), (ethyl octadecadienoate), a(ditertbutyl phthalate), (dicapryl phthalate), (diisocapryl phthalate), (acetic acid), (heptanoic acid), (octanoic acid), (nonanoic acid), (palmitic acid), (isoallyl-benzene), (phenylethanone), (octadecadienoic acid), (3-ene-nonanone-2), (cyclododecanone), (trans-nonenal-2), (tridecene), ((1-methyl-4-dioximethylthino-bicycle[2, 2, 2]octane), (tetradecane), (pentadecane), (hexadecane), (heptadecane), (octadecane), (nonadecane), (eicosane), (heneicosane), (docosane), (alpha, alpha-dimethyl-benzenemethanol), (1-methoxthyl-benzene), (2, 2, 2-tri-ethoxyl-ethanol), (1-methyl-4-isoallyl-cyclohexane)[1, 2].2. (ginsenoside) Rb1, Rd, Re, Rg, Rg2, Rh1[4-10], (gypenoside XV II)[11], (notoginsenoside) R1, R2, R3, R4, R6[11, 12].  4.42%[3,13].3. 三七氨酸(dencichine), (beta-N-oxalo-L-alpha, beta-diaminopropionic acid), 0.9%[14-16].4. (quercetin), (beta-sitosterol), (stigmasterol), (daucostgerol) [10, 17], (sanchinan A)[18]. Ca, Fe, Cu, Co, Cr, Mo, Mn, Mg, Ni, Zn[17].Dosage:用量:Take as powder form: 1 to 1.5 g.Use in decoction: 3 to 9 g.用于粉劑：1∼1.5 克。煎湯：3 ∼ 9 克。Sample of formulae:配方舉例:TMJ syndrome: apply san qi tincture on the most painful part of jaw. Once a day. 5 to 7 days is one therapy period. Result:32 cases all show improvement in jaw movements.顳頷關節下颔功能紊亂：三七粉末做成酊剤，貼於顳頷關節最痛部位。每天一次。5∼7次為一療程。结果：治療32例，使頷關節運動明顯改善。【18】Cautions:注意：Allergic reaction: face and eyes becomes red and swollen. Numbness in the limbs, dizziness, heaviness in the chest, palpitation, sweating, nausea, arrhythmia.Do not use during menses or during pregnancy. 不良反應：臉與眼發紅腫脹，心陣跳，發汗，作嘔，心律不整。月經期間，或懷孕期間忌用。[n] see Research Librarian[18]中药现代研究與臨床應用。陰健，郭力弓。Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告 　A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading              in progressProblems with website? Maladies Treated: red or white diarrhea (赤白下痢)
vaginal discharge due to infection (濕熱帶下)
Medical Function: possesses in vitro cholinesterase inhibiting properties [2], thus improves memory
enhances mnemonic performance and improves mood in healthy young participants [2]

extracts isolated from shu wei cao (common sage/Salvia officinalis) and Greek sage (Salvia triloba) inhibit to various degrees smooth-muscle contractions induced by acetylcholine, histamine, serotonin and barium chloride (BaCl2) [3]
Research:
體外試驗證實鼠尾草有膽鹼酯酶抑制性能[2]
Most of the extracts isolated from shu wei cao (common sage/Salvia officinalis) and Greek sage (Salvia triloba) inhibit to various degrees smooth-muscle contractions induced by acetylcholine, histamine, serotonin and barium chloride (BaCl2,) [3]
possesses in vitro cholinesterase inhibiting properties [2], thus improves memory.
enhances mnemonic performance and improve mood in healthy young participants.[2]
鼠尾草和希臘鼠尾草的提取物抑制乙酰膽鹼，組胺，5-羥色胺和氯化鋇引起的不同程度的平滑肌收縮 [3]
Chemical Ingredients: Ketone (C10H16O) - main component of essential oil
Borneol (C10H16O) - main component of essential oil
oleanolic acid (齊墩果酸, whole herb)
tormentic acid (委陵菜酸, whole herb)
maslinic acid (馬斯裡酸, whole herb)
ethyl-β-D-galactopyranoside (乙基-β-D-吡喃半乳糖甙, whole herb)

by: Joe Hing kwok Chu    朱興國編 譯  Pharmaceutical name:英文藥名﹕herba salviae japonicaeBotanical name:拉丁生物學名﹕Salvia officinalisSalvia japonica Thunb.Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕sobisoPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕seomicho
Pron. in Cantonese::粵音﹕syu2 mei5 cou2Other Names:別名﹕keng su 坑蘇, zi hua dan 紫花丹.Common Name:英文名﹕garden sage, common sageDistribution:產地﹕Jiangsu, Anhui, Zhejiang, Jiangxi, Hubei, Fujian, Taiwan, Guangdong, Guangxi provinces of China.It was originated from the Mediterranean area.分佈於江蘇、安徽、浙江、江西、湖北、福建、台灣、廣東、廣西等地.原産於地中海地區.Propertiescharacteristics﹕性味﹕bitter, acrid, neutral.苦, 辛, 平.Channels meridians entered: 歸經﹕lung, liver.肺，肝。Medical functions:藥理﹕ possesses in vitro 
    cholinesterase inhibiting properties [2], thus improves memory.enhances mnemonic performance and improve mood in healthy young participants.[2]Most of the extracts isolated from shu wei cao (common sage/Salvia officinalis) and Greek sage (Salvia triloba) inhibit to various degrees smooth-muscle contractions induced by acetylcholine, histamine, serotonin and barium chloride (BaCl2,) [3]體外試驗證實鼠尾草有膽鹼酯酶抑制性能[2]提高助記憶符作用和改善健康的年輕參與試驗者的情緒。[2]鼠尾草和希臘鼠尾草的提取物抑制乙酰膽鹼，組胺，5 - 羥色胺和氯化鋇引起的不同程度的平滑肌收縮 [3]Actions & Indications:[1]主治﹕【1】clears infection, promotes circulation and regulate menses, detoxification rids of swelling. Being used in jaundice; red or white diarrhea;  vaginal discharge due to infection; irregular menstruation; dysmenorrhea; sores, swollen boils; injuries from impacts.清熱利濕；活血調經；解 毒消腫。主黃疸；赤白下痢；濕熱帶下；月經不調；痛經；瘡瘍癤腫；跌打損傷Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕【1】Its essential oil can be as high as 2.5%. The basic ingredients are ketone and borneol.其精油含量最高可達 2.5%. 基本成分是酮(C10H16O)和 冰片(C10H16O)The whole herb contains:全草含：β-sitosterolβ-谷甾醇β-sitosterol glucosideβ-谷甾醇葡萄糖甙ursolic acid熊果酸oleanolic acid)齊墩果酸2α-hydroxyursolic acid2α-羥基熊果酸tormentic acid委陵菜酸caffeic acid咖啡酸maslinic acid馬斯裡酸ethyl-β-D-galactopyranoside乙基-β-D-吡喃半乳糖甙Daly Dosage:每日用量﹕In decoction 10 ~ 30 g煎湯, 10 ~ 30 克.Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕ Modern Research:現代研究﹕ 
Toxicity & Cautions:
毒素與禁忌﹕
[2]《zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草:  》[2] 
Neuropsychopharmacology. 2006 Apr;31(4):845-52.[3]

Name: bai shou wu
白首烏
Biological: Cynanchum auriculatum Royle ex Wight（耳葉牛皮消）
Other name: bai he shou wu 白何首烏
yi zhong san xiao 一腫三消

Geography: Eastern and middle southern part of China
Maladies Treated:
Taking orally in decoction, powder or pill form: used for conditions affecting the liver, kidney, spleen and stomach (specific conditions not explicitly named in text).
Prevention and treatment of tumors
Used for hair whitening (white hair); after use, 70% of patients' white hair turned black
Used for baldness; after use, 50% of patients with bald head grew new hair
Protection against injury caused by oxidation (anti-injury caused by ozone in experimental mice)
Reduction of oxidative injury–induced aging-like changes in mice: loss of body weight, decrease in body temperature, decreased physical strength, reduced resistance to cold, increase in lipid peroxidation in liver, brain, and lung, increase in monoamine oxidase-B (MAO-B) activity in brain
Prevention or mitigation of immune cell (α-naphthyl acetate esterase positive lymphocytes) reduction induced by cyclophosphamide (CTX) in mice
Antagonism against decrease in splenic antibody-secreting cells caused by cyclophosphamide in mice
Counteracting suppression of delayed-type hypersensitivity reaction induced by bovine serum albumin in mice
Counteracting thymus, spleen, and liver reduction in weight in mice due to cyclophosphamide or ozone injury
Medical Function:
Regulating immune system: Oral administration (gavage) of total phospholipids of bai shou wu at 200 mg/kg increased the proportion and absolute number of α-naphthyl acetate esterase (ANAE)-positive lymphocytes in normal mice peripheral blood, and prevented or treated the reduction in ANAE-positive lymphocytes induced by cyclophosphamide (CTX).
C21 steroid ester glycoside at 50 or 200 mg/kg orally administered for 10 days counteracted the reduction in antibody-secreting cells in mouse spleen and decline in delayed-type hypersensitivity to bovine serum albumin, as well as decreasing thymus and spleen weight caused by cyclophosphamide.
Antioxidant and anti-aging: Bai shou wu powder at 60 mg/mouse/day orally for 12 days reduced ozone-induced loss of terminal bronchiolar epithelial cells and proliferation in mouse lungs, as well as liver injury and atrophy of thymus and spleen, effects that resemble aging. Bai shou wu powder at 60 mg/mouse/day orally for 20 days in 60-day-old mice significantly improved ozone-induced body weight loss, lowered body temperature, fatigue, reduced resistance to cold, increased lipid peroxidation in liver, brain, lungs, and increased MAO-B activity in brain.
Promotes hair growth.
Protects the liver.
Lowers blood lipids.
Dosage:
Orally in decoction: 6 to 12 g per dose, or in powder or pill form. 
General dosage range: 3–30 g.
Contraindications:
No specific details given. 
Excerpted from: Zhonghua Bencao (中华本草；Chinese Materia Medica).
Research: According to a clinical study by the Skin Department of the Central Army Hospital, patients after drinking water-diluted juice of bai shou wu for 6 weeks, 70% of patients with white hair experienced restoration of black hair, and 50% of those with bald heads had new hair growth.
Notes:
ANAE: Acid α-naphthyl acetate esterase.
Cyclophosphamide (CTX), also known by trade names Cytoxan, Neosar, Procytox, is an alkylating agent used alone or with other drugs to treat various malignant tumors.
Identification notes: The cut surface of he shou wu (Polygonum multiflorum) root shows ring-like, cloud-brocade patterns (abnormal vascular bundles), and a woody center. In contrast, the two types of bai shou wu have scattered, radiating vascular bundles in the cut surface and lack abnormal vascular bundles. Flavor is first bitter, then sweet.

Chemical Ingredients: Phospholipids (present in high amount in the tuber of Cynanchum sp.)
C21 steroid ester glycoside (specifically mentioned for bai shou wu; Cynanchum sp.)
Wilfoside C3N, C1N, C1G, K1N (from total glycosides, isolated from Cynanchum sp.)
All essential amino acids, especially high in glutamic acid, aspartic acid, arginine
Minerals: phosphorus, potassium, copper, zirconium, selenium
Bungeisid A, B, C, D (in roots of Cynanchum bungei Decne, glycosides with hydroxyacetophenone aglycon)

References: [1] 牛皮消塊根中含較高的磷脂（phospholipid）成分。
[3] 總甙中已分離出隔山消甙（wilfoside）C3N、C1N、C1G、K1N和牛皮消甙（cynauricuoside）A、B、C。
[4] 蘿藦胺（gagamine）牛皮消素（caudatin），蘿藦甙元（metaplexigenin），12-O-桂皮酰基去酰蘿藦甙元（kidiolanin）等4個甙元。
[6] 白首烏二苯酮（baishouwubenzophenone），豐富的維生素B族和無機元素磷、鉀、銅、鋯、硒。
[21] 牛皮消C21甾體酯甙（C21 steroid ester glycoside）。
Original Text:
bai shou wu, Complementary and Alternative Healing University

    Healing University

B壾 Shǒu 
    Wū 白首
    烏


    Translated 

by: Joe Hing kwok Chu 
    朱興國編譯



Pharmaceutical name:
英文藥名﹕


Radix Cynanchi bungei



Botanical name:
學名﹕


Cynanchum 
        bungei Decne  (戟葉牛皮消)

Cynanchum auriculatum Royle ex Wight （耳
        葉牛皮消）
Cynanchum 
        wilfordii( Maxim.) Hemsl (隔山牛皮消)




Japanese Name:
日語﹕


yahazuikema



Pron. in Korean:
韓語發音﹕


baek shu ngo





        Pron. in Cantonese::
粵音﹕


baak6 sau2 wu1



Other Names:
別名﹕


ge shan xiao 隔山消、bai he 
        wu 白何烏、bai he shou wu 白何首烏、ge shan qiao 隔山撬、bai mu xiang 白木香、ye fan shu 
        野蕃薯、yi zhong san xiao 一腫三消、he pin shen 和平參、shan hua qi 山花旗、zhang guo lao 
        張果老



Common Name:
英文名﹕
 


Auriculate Swallowwort Root, Bunge Auriculate 
        Root



Distribution:
產地﹕


Easter and middle southern part of China, and 
        also in Hebei, Shaanxi, Gansu, Taiwan, Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan princes. 
        Also cultivated in Shandong and Jiangsu provinces of China.

分佈華東、中南及河北、陜西、甘肅、台灣、四川、貴州、雲南等地。山東、江蘇有栽培。




Properties
(characteristics)﹕
性味﹕


bitter, sweet, astringent.
味苦，甘，澀。




Channels (meridians) entered:
 
歸經﹕


liver, kidney, spleen, stomach.
肝，腎，脾，胃。




Medical functions:

藥理﹕
 




Effect of regulating  immune system. 

Anti injury caused by oxidation and anti aging.

Promotes hair growth

Protects liver

Lowering blood lipids

Effect of preventing and treating tumors

 


免疫調節作用：白首烏總磷脂200mg/kg灌胃，能提高正常小鼠末梢血α-醋酸萘酯酶(ANAE)陽
          性淋巴細胞比值及絕對數，對由環磷酰胺引起的α-醋酸萘酯酶陽性淋巴細胞比值和絕對數下降也有預防或治療作用。白首烏C21甾體酯甙50、200mg/kg 
          灌胃，連續10天，對環磷酰胺引起的小鼠脾抗體分泌細胞減少，牛血清白蛋白引起的遲髮型超敏反應的降低，胸腺、脾臟的減重均有對抗作用。

抗臭氧損傷：白首烏粉60mg/只灌胃，連續12天，對臭氧造成小鼠肺終末細支氣管上皮脫落伴增
          生，肝損傷，胸腺、脾臟萎縮等類似衰老的變化，均有減輕的作用。白首烏粉60mg/只灌胃，連續20天，對臭氧造成的60日齡小鼠體重減輕、體溫下降
          、體力減弱、禦寒能力降低，肝、腦、肺過氧化脂質增多，腦單胺氧化酶-B(MAO-B)活性增強等指標，均有明顯改善，證明白首烏有抗自由基損傷及抗
          衰老作用。

促進毛發生長作用

對肝臟的保護作用

降血脂作用

防治腫瘤作用

 




Actions & Indications:
主治﹕


taking orally: in decoction, 6 to 12 g, or take 
        in powder or pill form.
口服：煎湯，6～12克，或入丸，散。




Chemical ingredients:
化學成份﹕[1]


1．牛皮消 塊根中含較高的磷脂（phospholipid）
        成分[1]和c21甾體酯戟(C21 steroid ester glycoside)[21]。從總甙中已分離出隔山消甙（wilfoside）C3N、C1N、C1G、K1N和
        牛皮消甙（cynauricuoside）A、B、C [3]以及蘿藦胺（gagamine）[4]，牛皮消素（caudatin），蘿藦甙元（metaplexigenin）
        ，12-O-桂皮酰基去酰蘿藦甙元（kidiolanin）等4個甙元[4.5]。還含白首烏二苯酮（baishouwubenzophenone）[6]。
        另含人體所需的全部氨基酸，其中谷氨酸（glutamic acid），天冬氨酸（aspartic acid）和精氨酸（argi-nine）的含量最
        高；並含豐富的維生素，尤以B族的含量為高；還含較高的磷、鉀、銅、鋯、硒等無機元素[6]。
        　　2.戟葉牛皮消 (Cynanchum bungei Decne )根含羥基苯乙酮為甙元的甙類成分：戟 葉牛皮消甙（bungeisid）A、B、C、D；
        還含4-羥基苯乙酮（4-hydroxy-acetophenone），2，4-二羥基苯乙酮（2，4-dihydroxyacetophenone），
        　　布盧門醇（blumenol）A，左旋的春日菊醇（leucanthemitol），7-O-葡萄糖基甘草甙元（7-O- glucosylliquiritigenin）
        ，β-谷甾醇葡萄糖甙（β-sitosterol glucoside）[7]以及磷脂成分[1]。



Dosage:
用量﹕


3 ~ 30 g
3 ~ 30 克。



Samples of formulae:
處方舉例﹕


 



Modern Research:
現代研究﹕


According to a clinical study by the Skin Department 
        of the the Central Army Hospital, patients after drinking the water diluted 
        juice of bai shou wu, after 6 weeks, the white hair of 70% of the patients 
        turned black, 50 % of those with bald head grew new hair.
三軍總醫院皮膚科最近完成
        以中藥白首烏萃取液的臨床研究，加水稀釋 後給受試者服用，六周後，七成白髮者髮
        色變黑、五成禿頭患者還長出新毛。





Toxicity & Cautions:

毒素與禁忌﹕





【摘錄】《中華本草》（中醫世家）
Note:
ANAE：Acid 
    α-naphthyl acetate esterase
環磷酰胺(Cyclophosphamide，CTX)（Cytoxan�, 
    Neosar�, Cytoxan�, Procytox�）是一種烷化劑。單獨使用或與其它藥物聯合使用，用來治療多種惡性腫瘤。
【鑒別要點】何首烏之切面皮部具環列的雲錦狀花紋（異型維管束），中央有木
    心。而兩種白首烏飲片切面維管束呈稀疏的放射狀排列，均無異型維管束。味先苦後甜。

Last update: Nov 9, 2013; 11 p.m. 
        LAH

Properties: root and leaves: acrid, warm, toxic
Maladies Treated: constipation, distention, abdominal fullness and pain caused by extreme coldness of bowels
topical uses: abscesses and ulcers, to speed up ulceration of abscesses
Medical Function: stimulant effect on skin and mucous membranes
affects digestive tract and influences secretion of bile and pancreatic fluids: aqueous extract increases secretion of bile and pancreatic juice
affects circulatory system: raises blood pressure
antipathogenic (antibacterial) action: decoction has some antibacterial effect against Haemophilus influenzae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Staphylococcus aureus, and Corynebacterium diphtheriae
oil preparations can reduce mortality and prolong survival of mice infected with epidemic Japanese encephalitis
hemolytic effect: crotin has hemolytic activity
Dosage:
internal use: 0.15 to 0.3 g, remove skin and press out oil (ba dou shuang), make into pills or powder form.
external use: appropriate amount. Grind into powder or smash into pulp and wrap with gauze on affected parts.
Roots: 3 to 9 g. Leaves: appropriate amount. Boil with water for washing the affected parts.
Samples of Formulae: jiu zi wan (韭子丸) (Saint Ji's General Record)
Contraindications:
This herb is very toxic and should be used with extreme care.
Do not use in cases of pregnancy or in weak patients.
Do not use with quan niu zi (牽牛子, morning glory seed).
The seed is highly toxic. Use with caution.
Research:
Aqueous extract can increase secretion of bile and pancreatic juice.
Ba dou decoction has demonstrated some antibacterial effect against Haemophilus influenzae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Staphylococcus aureus, and Corynebacterium diphtheriae.
Ba dou oil preparations can lower mortality and prolong survival of mice infected with epidemic Japanese encephalitis.
Original Text:
ba dou, Complementary and Alternative Healing University





    Complementary and Alternative Healing University

ba dou 巴豆   
 (in English and Chinese 中英文) Edited by: Joe Hing kwok Chu 
Pharmaceutical name:英文藥 名﹕
Semen Croton TigiliiBotanical name:學名﹕
Croton tiglium Linn.Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕
hazuPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕
paduPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕
baa1 dau6Other Names:別名﹕
jiang zi, gang zi, ba dou rouCommon Name:英文名﹕
croton seedDistribution:產地﹕
Sichuan, Guangxi, Yunnan, GuizhouProperties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕
seed: acrid, hot, very toxic
root and leaves: acrid, warm, toxic
種子：辛，熱；有大毒。
根、葉：辛、溫，有毒。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕
stomach, large intestine, lung
肺﹐大腸﹐ 胃Medical functions:藥理﹕ 
對皮膚粘膜的刺激作用：  致瀉作用  對胃腸消化道及膽汁、胰液分泌的影響：巴豆水劑能增加膽汁和胰液的分泌。  對循環系統作用：升高血壓  血小板凝集作用  抗病原生物的作用：巴豆煎劑對流感杆菌、綠膿杆菌、金黃色葡萄球菌及白喉杆菌均有一定的抗菌作用，巴豆油制劑能降低感染流行性乙型腦炎的小鼠死亡率並延長存活時間。  鎮痛作用  抗腫瘤及促腫瘤發生作用
溶血作用：巴豆毒有溶解紅血球作用Actions & Indications:主治﹕
as laxative for constipation, distention, abdominal fullness and pain, caused by extreme coldness of bowels 
for ascites 
for clogged phlegm 
for topical uses for abscesses and ulcers, to speed up ulceration of abscessesChemical ingredients:化學成份﹕


Phorbol esters is the main ingredient of the resin

巴豆醇酯是巴豆樹脂中的主要成分

Seed contains:

種子含:

蛋白質18%

Crotin

β-谷 甾醇

Glyceride

甘油酯，

Phorbol diester 4％

巴豆醇一12，13一二酯（其量約佔巴 豆油的4％

Phorbol triester 4%

巴豆醇三酯（經酸性轉酯反應可轉變成巴 豆醇一12，13一二酯，其量亦約佔巴豆油的4％

Crotonic acid

巴豆油酸

巴豆酸

戊酸Dosage:用量﹕
internal use: 0.15 to 0.3 , rid of skin and press out oil (ba dou shuang), make into pills, or powder form.
external use: appropriate amount. Grind into powder or smash into pulp and wrap with gauze on affected parts. Roots: 3 to 9 g .Leaves: appropriate amount. Boil with water for washing the affected parts.
用量種子0.15～0.3克 ，內服去種皮榨去油(巴 豆霜)， 配入丸、散劑，外用適量，研末塗或搗爛以紗布包搽患處。
根3～9克 ；葉外用適量，煎水洗患處
 Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕
jiu zi wan 韭子丸《聖濟總錄》Modern Research:現代研究﹕
 Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕
This herb is very toxic and should be used with extreme care.
Not to use in cases of pregnancy or in weak patients. Do not use with quan niu zi.
種子有大毒。須小心應用。
有毒，體弱和孕婦忌服。不能與牽 牛子同 用。
